attributes.action: Over 60's should not be able to vote on our generations issues!
attributes.additional_details: The youth are the future of the nation however the voices of the past get heard allot more! this has to stop.
attributes.background: Anything from the EU vote to who becomes the new leader of the country are all decisions which will affect the current and young generation most. We are the ones who'll be living and dealing with the changes allot more. People who are older don't have to worry so much, our youth are your future!
